评论概述: This sweater with the spider & webb is awesome
评论详情: I bought 2 of these, quality is great-color black/white spider web-very comfortable and definitely warm..gift for my gdaughter and her boyfriend and they both love them..perfect size M fits great on them

The sweater itself is awesome.  The material seems like a double knit material.  Thick and soft.  My only con is that the sweater had a crazy strong unpleasant perfume smell.  Not sure if it is manufactured that way or if I got someone's return who had doused themselves with some weird smell.

I really love how this looks. The material is really good, but sometimes it gets stuck with Bracelets and things like that, The comfort is really good. I wouldn’t recommend you Live in a hot place though. I only use it on nights and it looks really good with some Fits of mine. Would recommend 10 out of 10

评论概述: Great quality, cool design, fits great.
评论详情: This sweater is absolutely perfect. The spider graphic sweater looks so cool, my son loves it. The quality is amazing, and so is the graphic design. It is a little thicker than I expected, but very soft and comfortable. My son doesn't like the mock or turtle neck, this sweater meets his expectations, he loves how it fits around the neck.  It looks great to match with jeans and jogger pants.

I ordered the black spider design in large and it is such a cool looking sweater! It looks pretty big, even for a large, but it might be because its heavy wool and bulky. The material is very soft, not scratchy at all. It's going to be nice and warm for the upcoming cold winter months
